post.title: help. i need the mms settings (server, ip, etc)
post.content: okay, i got a ux830 (lg glimmer) from us cellular to work on the alltel network. all i need now is to get mms working. i need. primary mmsc server: secondary mmsc server: (i can't change this one for some reason) user agent profile: mmsc post url: upload address: mmsc post cgi: authorization: model id: thanks for the help if you guys know. previous threads haven't been of much use.
